title: Dark mode support for better night-time usage
description: It would be great to have a dark mode option for users who prefer working in low-light environments. This would reduce eye strain during extended usage sessions and provide a more modern user experience. Many popular applications now offer this feature as standard.
author: Sarah Chen

title: Export data to CSV functionality
description: Users should be able to export their data in CSV format for analysis in external tools like Excel or Google Sheets. This would be especially useful for generating reports and sharing data with team members who don't have direct access to the platform.
author: Michael Rodriguez

title: Mobile app crashes when uploading large images
description: The mobile application consistently crashes when trying to upload images larger than 5MB. This happens on both iOS and Android devices. Steps to reproduce: 1. Open mobile app 2. Navigate to upload section 3. Select image larger than 5MB 4. App crashes immediately. This is blocking our mobile workflow significantly.
author: Emily Johnson

title: Improve search functionality with filters
description: The current search feature is quite basic and could benefit from advanced filtering options. Users should be able to filter by date ranges, categories, tags, and user types. This would make finding specific content much more efficient, especially for power users managing large datasets.
author: David Kim

title: Redesign the navigation menu for better usability
description: The current navigation menu is cluttered and hard to navigate, especially on smaller screens. A cleaner, more intuitive design would greatly improve the user experience. Consider implementing a collapsible sidebar with better visual hierarchy and grouping of related items.
author: Lisa Wang

title: Add keyboard shortcuts for power users
description: Power users would benefit greatly from keyboard shortcuts for common actions like creating new items, saving, searching, and navigating between sections. This would significantly speed up workflows for frequent users of the platform.
author: James Thompson

title: Notification settings are not saving properly
description: When I try to update my notification preferences in the settings panel, the changes don't persist after refreshing the page. This bug affects both email and in-app notification settings. I've tried this on multiple browsers with the same result.
author: Rachel Green

title: Better color contrast for accessibility compliance
description: Some text elements have poor color contrast ratios that don't meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards. This makes the interface difficult to read for users with visual impairments. Specifically, the gray text on light backgrounds needs improvement to ensure accessibility compliance.
author: Alex Martinez

title: Offline mode for mobile app
description: It would be incredibly useful to have basic offline functionality in the mobile app. Users should be able to view previously loaded content and create drafts that sync when connectivity is restored. This is essential for users who frequently work in areas with poor internet connectivity.
author: Sam Patel

title: Slack integration for team notifications
description: Our team heavily uses Slack for communication, and it would be amazing to have native integration that sends notifications about important updates, new feedback, and status changes directly to our Slack channels. This would help keep everyone in the loop without having to constantly check the platform.
author: Jessica Liu
